definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite

sentences.english: Output storage method is adopted to cancel the offset voltage.
sentences.chinese: 通过输出存储的方法消除比较器失调电压的影响。

sentences.english: Single Supply, High Slew Rate, Low Input Offset Voltage Operational Amplifiers.
sentences.chinese: 单电源，高压摆率，低输入失调电压运算放大器。

sentences.english: Single Supply, High Slew Rate, Input Offset Voltage Operational Amplifiers.
sentences.chinese: 单电源，高压摆率，输入失调电压运算放大器。

sentences.english: Ultra low offset voltage operational amplifier.
sentences.chinese: 超低失调电压运算放大器。

sentences.english: Low power low offset voltage dual comparator.
sentences.chinese: 低功耗低失调电压双比较器。

definition: filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
